title: Adhd Adults
content:
* There are things you can do to make it easier to live with ADHD.


![Cyclist rides down a sunny country road](https://healthify.nz/assets/Healthy-Living/Exercise/Bike-rider-in-the-country-canva-950x690.jpg)
QR Code Print
####  What is ADHD? (+ VIDEO) 
ADHD is a neurodevelopmental condition. This means that if you have ADHD there are differences in the parts of your brain which control your ability to plan, organise and focus compared to those without it.
